reward.schedule: Net-7 (Funds paid 7 days after sale to clear refund window)

pitch_data.headline: Stop Chatting. Start Building.
pitch_data.problem: ChatGPT is a walled garden where you act as the data entry clerk.
pitch_data.solution: Openclaw is an autonomous employee that runs locally on your hardware.

comparison.chatgpt: Like a Consultant. Gives advice. Lives in a browser tab. You still have to do the clicking.
comparison.openclaw: Like an Employee. Does the work. Lives on your OS with full terminal access. The work is done when you wake up.

key_benefits: Privacy: Data stays on your machine.
Power: Native terminal and file access.
Cost: One-time fee, no monthly subscription.
